text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: You heard the sound of a violin from the school building……?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Indeed, that seems to be the time that I was playing. Did the sound interfere with your work?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: …… I understand. I will keep that in mind next time.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: There is still much for me to learn.
